mapper.update: update torga set sBankTypeCode = #{sbanktypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankKind = #{sbankkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankName = #{sbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sTopBankCode = #{stopbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sPBCode = #{spbcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankAreaCode = #{sbankareacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankCityCode = #{sbankcitycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sBankState = #{sbankstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sBankCode, sBankTypeCode, sBankKind, sBankName, sTopBankCode, sPBCode, sBankAreaCode, sBankCityCode, sBankState from torga where sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sBankCode, sBankTypeCode, sBankKind, sBankName, sTopBankCode, sPBCode, sBankAreaCode, sBankCityCode, sBankState from torga
